page.title: 19A day in the life of
page.content: Mrs.Jukes{:We asked Mrs.Jukes, our {childrens supervisor at school, what {she does in an average day of her {life:}I get up and get dressed. I get the breakfast and get the cat food ready to take up to the Poker (local pub)to feed the cats there.I cut some sandwiches and then I do the housework or gardening. On Monday I go to help Mrs.Clegg. Then I get dinner ready.I come to school for 11.45 to 1.30.Then I take the dog for a walk,then I wash/up or knit,garden depending on the wearther I sometimes go for a long walk. {Have things alot from say 10 years {ago?:}No not a lot. {How long have you lived in {Leintwardine? }Since 1931. {Do you shop in Leintwardine?}Yes I have to. {Do you ever think about {moving ?}Yes,but I never would.
